### [Rule Actions](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEOnDemandRuleAction#Rule-Actions)

[`case connect`](/documentation/networkextension/neondemandruleaction/connect)Start the VPN connection for every connection attempt.[`case disconnect`](/documentation/networkextension/neondemandruleaction/disconnect)Do not start the VPN connection, and disconnect the VPN connection if it is not currently disconnected.[`case evaluateConnection`](/documentation/networkextension/neondemandruleaction/evaluateconnection)Start the VPN after evaluating the destination host being accessed against the ruleâ€™s parameters.[`case ignore`](/documentation/networkextension/neondemandruleaction/ignore)Do not start the VPN connection, but do not disconnect it if it is currently connected.### [Initializers](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEOnDemandRuleAction#Initializers)
